marketing-text: Open source nsanja ya COVID19 data. Advanced dashboard ndi browser plug komanso free REST API, yowonetsedwa muzilankhulo zonse.
name: Dzinalo
promo-message: Lopangidwa ndi chikondi ❤️ ndi gulu ku Hoobu.com. Konzekerani ulendo wanu wobwera pambuyo pa mliri tsopano ndi wopanga maulendo ena othandizirana othandizirana
who-public-advice: Uphungu wa anthu onse wa WHO
general-advice-wash-hands-description: Sambani m'manja pafupipafupi kwa mphindi 20 kugwiritsa ntchito sopo ndi madzi mutapumira mphuno, kutsokomola kapena kusisita komanso musanadye kapena kugwira chakudya. Kusamba m'manja moyenera ndi njira yothandiza kwambiri yophera ma virus.
general-advice-minimise-contact-descript: Chepetsani misonkhano yofunikira & maulendo osafunikira ndikusaka njira zina moni monga kugwirana chanza, kugwirana kapena kupsompsonana.
general-advice-avoid-face-description: Manja amatha kunyamula mosavuta ma virus ndipo kamodzi atayipitsidwa, manja amatha kusamutsa kachilomboka m'maso, mphuno kapena pakamwa. Kuchokera pamenepo, kachilomboka amathanso kulowa mthupi lanu ndikukudwalitsani.
general-advice-be-hygienic-description: Kutseka pakamwa panu ndi mphuno ndi mkono kapena ndewu yoyimirira mukakhosomola kapena kufinya, ndipo mutaye minofu yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito nthawi yomweyo.
general-advice-self-isolate-description: Ngati mukukhala ndi chimfine ngati zizindikiro muyenera kudzipatula nokha ngati njira yopewera komanso kupewa ngozi yofalitsa matendawa ndikukhala kunyumba.
